name: Father 3
description:
Father 3 is a fan translation project decades in the making! It features full voice acting, multiple endings, and an extensive campaign, carefully crafted over half a lifetime to perfectly encapsulate the quirky artistic vision that only the best quirky EarthBound-inspired indie RPGs have! It's like aged peanut cheese!

It is advised to consult your doctor before playing video games. Especially this one!
